message: i have master and develop branches. How can I marge in master a specific tag of develop?
and also, how can I merge master a specific rev of master?
not just the revision or the tag, but the hole branch up to that tip or revision
sorry on (2) is a specific rev of develop
so `git merge <tag>` will merge in a specific tag
Branches and tags are still just pointers to a revision.  You can merge things by referencing their commit hash.
`git merge <revision-sha1>` will merge every revision up to and including that commit
So, that's the difference with cherry-pick? cherry-pich only gets *one* commit?
awesome. I wasn't sure that git merger revision would do all the revisions up to that one...
@aseba Cherry-pick only gets revisions explicitly listed.  You can list more than one.
"git merge <sha1>" will make sure that any changes up to sha1 will be included in the current branch. "git cherry-pick <sha1>" will onlu add that specific commit.
